Package com.feis.eduhub.backend.common.exceptions

package com.feis.eduhub.backend.common.exceptions
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppException
    Custom generic App Exception for application-specific errors handling.
    DatabaseConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues connecting to the database.
    DatabaseQueryException
    Exception thrown when there is an error during any database query operation.
    DataFetchException
    Exception thrown when there is an error while fetching data from the database Returns HTTP status code 400 (Bad Request) when thrown.
    EmailSendingException
    Exception thrown when there is a failure while sending an Email.
    InvalidCredentialsException
    Exception thrown when user credentials are invalid.
    MailingSystemConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues while trying to connect to the mailing system.
    NotFoundException
    Exception thrown when no data was found while fetching from a data soruce (such as DB or Redis) Returns HTTP status code 404 (Not Found) when thrown.
    PasswordHashingException
    Exception thrown when string hashing fails.
    RedisConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues while connecting to Redis.
    UnauthorizedException
     
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown when the values passed in the request appear to be invalid after a validation process.
